data.title: Corvids Literature Database
data.meta_description: Corvids Literature Database, Bibliografien zu Rabenv�geln weltweit, Infos zu ihrer Verbreitung, ihrer Biologie und ihrem Verhalten
data.text:
About the project/Imprint

10000 publications (2437 with abstract, 5238 with link to full text)

41745 entries (sum of all records per taxon)

517 specimens found at GBIF related to CLD papers

144 specimens and observations provided by CLD to GBIF related to CLD papers

70488 sequences found at GenBank/EMBL/DDBJ related to CLD papers

Last update: 2021-08-17 12:16:04 CET Please cite us as:

Droege, G. and Töpfer, T. (2016): The Corvids Literature Database: 500 years of ornithological research from a crow's perspective. Database: bav122. doi: 10.1093/database/bav122. CLD:8226
